modName: Shrouded Robes Enchantable Temperable Light Armor Dark Brotherhood
summary:
Adds a complete set in the look of the Dark Brotherhood Cloth Armor, accessible per Console
compatible with PerMa
descriptionHtml:
To get the items do the following:

- Open the Console

- Enter [b][i]help shrouded[/i][/b] to find out the Item IDs. The new Items have a [i]C[/i] at the end of the name

- Enter [b][i]player.additem XXXXXXXX[/i][/b] for each Item ID.


No Items were changed. The added Items are light armor, fully temperable and enchantable.

(Not quite sure if Khajiit are supported, probably not)

Compatible with PerMa
author: Ownly Me
